thread.title: World-wide collaboration is now an easy possibility with Enterprise Software Development services from Anahata Technologies
thread.title_full: World-wide collaboration is now an easy possibility with Enterprise Software Development services from Anahata Technologies - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: World-wide collaboration is now an easy possibility with Enterprise Software Development services from Anahata Technologies
text:
A leading Melbourne Software Development Company, Anahata Technologies is offering Enterprise Software Development at the market’s best rates.
It goes without doubt that technology is advancing by the day today. Each day newer versions of technological gadgets hit the market making the older ones obsolete. Software is one such technological marvel that has completely transformed the way the world exists. Millions of software are developed every single day to provide better, faster and more convenient solutions to users. To keep up with the changing times and fuel this growth story, Anahata Technologies Pty Ltd is providing enterprise software development services at the most competitive rates. The development services that their software developers in Melbourne provide assist businesses in managing applications, databases, operating systems, virtual machines, servers and many others. Entrepreneurs seeking top notch quality enterprise solutions can count on this reputed firm for providing professionally managed exceptional services.
Anahata Technologies Pty Ltd is an industry leader for providing customer centric enterprise software development services at the industry’s best rates. Through their development services, business owners not only get assistance in enhancing the productivity of their workforce, but also in driving a good chunk of revenue into their business. In addition to providing enterprise software development services, this reputed software development company in Melbourne also offers Business Process Improvement, Mobile Application Development, Cloud Development, Embedded Development and many other services. The wide range of development services that they provide meet the highest quality standards and are sure to fulfill the needs of every business. The company also allows their customers to get free on-site custom software assessment, in which they provide an overview of suggested business process improvements and also a high level software solution proposal. Moreover, they also offer referral incentives to companies and individuals anywhere in Australia or overseas for software development projects.
Talking more about their services of enterprise software development in Melbourne , one of their representatives stated, “Anahata’s main field of expertise is the analysis, design, implementation and support of enterprise level applications. Our preferred approach is to offer our customers a 100% cross platform solution based on open standards avoiding vendor lock-in scenarios. On a fully flexible stack, our enterprise applications can run on essentially any server, storage system, operating system, virtual environment and over a large choice of application servers and databases.”
About Anahata Technologies Pty Ltd
Founded in Western Australia in 2010 by Pablo Rodriguez Pina, Anahata Technologies Pty Ltd is an Australian privately owned Software Development Company with presence in Perth and Melbourne specializing in the analysis, design, implementation and support of cost-effective custom built software applications.
Anahata’s preferred delivery approach is an iterative, agile, customer centric software development process where business analysts and developers work with the customers to gather requirements and an understanding of the current business processes, and to design and deliver a software solution that not only meets the business’s needs, but also is designed to improve business productivity.
Anahata’s preferred technological choice is to deliver cross-platform solutions based on open standards and open source technology that ensure stability, compatibility, and security over a long application life span. This enables a reduction in upfront and ongoing licensing fees.
Anahata is an Oracle Certified Partner and delivers custom software solutions based on Oracle Technology, such as Java, Java Enterprise Edition, MySQL or Oracle Database. The Australian software company is a certified MYOB developer partner providing Custom Software solutions that can integrate seamlessly with any MYOB software package such as MYOB AccountRight desktop or MYOB AccountRight Live (cloud).
